metadata.name: HIRO ITO♯1
metadata.description:
One of the main characters in "Shoot! ~A New Legend". The “king” of the Kurihama Gakuen High School soccer team. Hiro Ito is bright, confident, and positive. Because of his style of play, in which he uses only his left foot, he was not liked by Yuichi Maezawa, the former head coach of the soccer club, and was removed from the lineup. However, the new coach, Yumiko Ohara, who places importance on individuality, evaluated his left foot as a "miraculous left". Since then, he has been a key member of the team and commander, the "king" of "Kingdom Soccer". His specialty is his "accel shoot," in which the sharp rotation of a ball runs up the goalkeeper's body and scores even if a ball is caught. 


 『シュート! ～新たなる伝説～』の主人公のひとり。久里浜の王様。明るく自信家で前向きな性格。左足ばかりを使うプレイスタイルから、サッカー部前監督の前沢雄一に気に入られず、レギュラーを外されていた。しかし個性を重視する新監督の大原由実子は、彼の左足を「奇跡の左」と評価。 以降チームの要として「キングダムサッカー」の「キング」=司令塔とする。鋭い回転によって、受け止められてもゴールキーパーの体を駆け上がってゴールする「アクセルシュート」が得意。
